Summary: Starlike light moved across the sky. Made several flashes and changed direction and flashed some more.
divs: Sighting DetailsStarlike light moved across the sky to the East of the Adelaide northern beach area, traveling from North to South. It had a similar illumination and speed to a satellite. It then flashed quite brightly while moving then flashed again less brightly, flashed again brightly. It appeared to turn 180��� and travel back from the direction it came from flashing a couple more times. It then made one almighty bright flash like a giant flashgun, much much brighter than any star, and disappeared.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Adelaide
There was one other sighting in Adelaide on or around January 21st 2012
